Text: FW PRESIDENTIAL BUSHS SPECIAL CHRISTMAS GREETINGPST Original Message From McPherson John L Maj ACCSFXC mailto To Cheri McPherson Email mailto Sent PM Subject FW PRESIDENTIAL BUSHS SPECIAL CHRISTMAS GREETING Wow Original Message From Tim Garvin mailto Sent Tuesday December PM To Don Bell McPherson John L Maj HQ ACCSFOT McPherson Scott Cindy Llewellyn Jack McPherson Art Salvitti Karen Salvitti Subject Fw PRESIDENTIAL BUSHS SPECIAL CHRISTMAS GREETING Original Message From mailto To mailto Sent Monday December AM Subject PRESIDENTIAL BUSHS SPECIAL CHRISTMAS GREETING If you cant see this picture please visit httpwwwPresidentialPrayerTeamorg christmascheadgif Christmas is a time of wonder and joy of generosity and peace that brings family and friends together in celebration and song We sing old hymns and familiar carols we show love for others in the giving of gifts and we observe the hallowed traditions that make the season special This year in the midst of extraordinary times our Nation has shown the world that though there is great evil there is a greater good Americans have given of themselves sacrificing to help others and showing the spirit of love and sharing that is so much a part of the Christmas season According to the Gospel of Luke two thousand years ago the savior of mankind came into the world Christians believe that Jesus birth was the incarnation of God on earth opening the door to new hope and eternal life Picture of President and Laura Bush in front of Christmas tree at the whitehouse christmaspresidentbushjpg At Christmastime Christians celebrate Gods love revealed to the world through Christ And the message of Jesus is one that all Americans can embrace this holiday season to love one another This Christmas we remember those who are without their loved ones They continue to be in our hearts and prayers May they experience peace and may they find hope And as we again celebrate Christs birth may the glorious light of Gods goodness and love shine forth from our land Laura joins me in wishing you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year May Gods blessings of peace be upon us and upon the world GEORGE W BUSH Our President understands and believes in the real meaning of Christmas Feel free to forward his meaningful Christmas greeting to all of your friends and loved ones For more information about the Presidential Prayer Team or if you cannot view the above special greeting please visit If you are not a member add your name to over one million people who have joined The Presidential Prayer Team by clicking here or cutting and pasting the web location to your web browser signupasp There is no fee to join Presidential Prayer Team Seal christmaspptsealgif The Presidential Prayer Team PO Box Orange CA NOTE In accordance with Title USC section this material is distributed without profit or payment to those who have expressed a prior interest in receiving this information The Presidential Prayer Team is a national c nonprofit organization established to encourage and remind individuals to pray for the President his advisors and our nations leaders The PPT does not endorse support or oppose political candidates campaigns or parties Individual and corporate contributions are taxdeductible cCopyright The Presidential Prayer Team Inc All rights reserved The Presidential Prayer Team name and seal is a
